content: **pattern revised on 05/06/2011 ** this is a very versatile square for those who don t want holes in a granny square pattern is for the beginner and gives instructions on working square to desired size this pattern is a building block for your pattern library come join me at my ravelry group 1 where we test patterns host cals and swaps 1 http //www ravelry com/groups/melinda-miller-designs
